Content input

Pick a song to cover. The song needs to be in 4/4, so don't pick a waltz! You can choose a specific section of the song by specifying the start and end time in beats (assuming the song has a uniform tempo) below. Please make sure that it starts on a downbeat.

Style input

This is the song to take the style from. For best results, pick an 8-bar (32-beat) section.
